Title: Relates to authorizing certain local governments in Suffolk county to alter property tax payment schedules
Summary: Authorizes certain local governments in Suffolk county to alter property tax and school tax payment schedules to permit the 2nd half of property taxes to be paid quarterly.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 311 of the laws of 1920 relating to the assessment and collection of taxes in Suffolk county, in relation to authorizing certain local governments to alter property tax payment schedules; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof
